```{r message = FALSE}

library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
library(rvest)
library(httr)
library(xml2)
```

## Scraping CAC40 data

```{r}

df <- read_html("https://finance.yahoo.com/quote/%5EFCHI/history?p=%5EFCHI")
```

```{r}

df <- df |> 
  html_nodes("table") %>% 
  .[[1]] %>% 
  html_table(fill = TRUE)
```

```{r}

df
```
